articles.title: How to Use Copilot to Save Money on Grocery Costs
articles.summary: Here's how to use artificial intelligence as a search tool to find grocery deals -- just make sure you double check that the info is up to date.

articles.title: The Case for Being an AI Hater. Or at Least a Skeptic
articles.summary: Billions of dollars have been invested in artificial intelligence. But the returns have been middling at best.
articles.translated_title: The Case for Being an AI Hater. Or at Least a Skeptic

articles.title: Microsoft AI Chief Mustafa Suleyman Warns Of 'Psychosis Risk' From 'Seemingly Conscious AI' Amid $13 Billion AI Boom
articles.summary: Microsoft Corp. artificial intelligence Chief Mustafa Suleyman warned on Tuesday about emerging risks from "Seemingly Conscious AI" systems.

articles.title: DeepSeek hints latest model supported by China’s ‘next generation’ homegrown AI chips
articles.summary: Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek has hinted that China will soon have homegrown "next generation" chips to support its AI development.
articles.translated_title: DeepSeek hints latest model supported by China’s ‘next generation’ homegrown AI chips

articles.title: The AI vibe shift is upon us
articles.summary: Rather suddenly, there’s been a vibe shift around artificial intelligence, the tech that’s hypnotized Wall Street and inspired cultish devotion across Silicon Valley over the past three years.
articles.translated_title: The AI vibe shift is upon us
articles.translated_summary: Rather suddenly, there’s been a vibe shift around artificial intelligence, the tech that’s hypnotized Wall Street and inspired cultish devotion across Silicon Valley over the past three years.

articles.title: Editorial: AI meets fried chicken at Wingstop
articles.summary: At a moment when artificial intelligence is progressing at a rapid rate and the job market is tightening, one fast-food chain offers a glimpse into how everyday businesses are adopting AI to improve efficiency — and reduce their workforce.
articles.translated_title: Editorial: AI meets fried chicken at Wingstop
articles.translated_summary: At a moment when artificial intelligence is progressing at a rapid rate and the job market is tightening, one fast-food chain offers a glimpse into how everyday businesses are adopting AI to improve efficiency — and reduce their workforce.

articles.title: Nvidia Urges Taiwan to Embrace Nuclear Power Ahead of Referendum
articles.summary: Nuclear power is an “excellent option” for Taiwan, as demand from energy-intensive artificial intelligence is set to skyrocket in the tech manufacturing hub, according to Nvidia Corp.
articles.translated_title: Nvidia Urges Taiwan to Embrace Nuclear Power Ahead of Referendum
articles.translated_summary: Nuclear power is an “excellent option” for Taiwan, as demand from energy-intensive artificial intelligence is set to skyrocket in the tech manufacturing hub, according to Nvidia Corp.

articles.title: Snopestionary: AI slop, explained
articles.summary: The rise of artificial intelligence tools has left many social media users scrambling to figure out what's real and what isn't.
articles.translated_summary: The rise of artificial intelligence tools has left many social media users scrambling to figure out what's real and what isn't.

articles.title: Meta Signs $10 Billion Google Cloud Computing Deal Amid AI Race
articles.summary: Meta Platforms Inc. has agreed to a deal worth at least $10 billion with Alphabet Inc.’s Google for cloud computing services, according to people familiar with the matter, part of the social media giant’s spending spree on artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Meta Signs $10 Billion Google Cloud Computing Deal Amid AI Race
articles.translated_summary: Meta Platforms Inc. has agreed to a deal worth at least $10 billion with Alphabet Inc.’s Google for cloud computing services, according to people familiar with the matter, part of the social media giant’s spending spree on artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Google scores six-year Meta cloud deal worth over $10 billion
articles.summary: Alphabet and Meta compete in online advertising, but Meta needs more data center infrastructure as it pursues artificial intelligence growth.
